content.description: Start sitting on left side of Dream Time face with hands matched on good jug. Climb up and right following a reachy line of good jugs/flakes. Finish several feet to the left of Dream Time.
Start sitting with hands matched on left side of Dream Time rail. Climb straight up using good jugs/flakes on left.  Topout the same as Sweet Dreams.

Start sitting with hands matched on right side of rail. Pull on and move up and right to crimps in the middle of the face; adjust the left foot to a high heel on the rail and then reach out to the right arete, match it and then move hands up to the lip. Mantel to finish the climb.
content.protection: 2-3 pads, landing is a bit rocky.
content.location: Start in the middle of the Dream Time boulder, as for Dream Time and Arete Dreaming, on obvious edge underneath the Dream Time crimps.

content.description: Start sitting with hands matched on right side of dream time rail. Lock off lefty and reach right hand up to good crimp. Match crimp, move left heel up to starting rail, and make long reach up and left for sidepull sloper. Switch feet and move right hand to lip of boulder. Mantel to finish.
content.location: Starting in the middle of the Dream Time boulder, on obvious edge under the chalked crimps; #3 on the beta photo.

content.description: Start as for Dream Time on the block in the middle of the face, move left to crimps and holds around the arete and top out straight up
content.protection: Couple of pads, landing isn’t the best.

content.description: A cool wall just below Earthmover at the Lost Crag.
